alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 22 at 2:09PM MST until November 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches across the northern half of the Range and up to 20 inches in the southern half of the Range. North winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Vehicle travel will be impacted first over Granite Pass and then over Powder River Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow falls during the daylight hours on Thanksgiving.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West
